alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:34PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SCREVEN, HAMPTON, COLLETON AND ALLENDALE COUNTIES... At 134 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crocketville to 8 miles northwest of Shirley, and moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Hampton, Lake Warren State Park, Varnville, Estill, Fairfax, Brunson, Gifford and Scotia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
